title: Most Powerful AI Clothes Remover Tool
description: Undressor uses the most advanced AI technologies to make your photos and video look as realistic as possible. Upload your image, customize the settings, and create your perfect look!

meta.title: Undressor –  AI Photo & Video Undressing Tool for Free | AI Undressor App
meta.description: Undressor is a powerful AI undressing tool for photos and videos. Upload your image, choose undress mode, and get realistic deepnude results online in seconds.

howWork.title: How to start using Undressor
howWork.description: Undressor is powered by a big LLM model that has learned from thousands of images. It understands shapes, clothing, and body features to generate accurate and natural-looking results in seconds.
howWork.step1: You don’t need an account to use it
howWork.step2: Just pick a mode that fits your needs
howWork.step3: Upload your image and get the result right away

sliderCompare.title: How does it work?
sliderCompare.description: Undressor uses AI to analyze the image you upload. The system detects body shape, clothing layers, and background details. Based on this data, it creates a realistic version of the photo/video without clothes.

securitySafe.title: Secure and Private
securitySafe.description: We do not use your images. Your images are saved safely just for you. We don’t use them for anything else and never show them to others.

q1.question: What is Undressor?
q1.answer: Undressor is a leading AI-powered online tool that digitally removes clothing from images. Using the latest technologies and advanced algorithms, it delivers highly realistic, high-quality results. Undressor is one of the best AI clothing removal and reveal applications in the world.

q2.question: Is my data safe?
q2.answer: Yes. All photo processing is done securely and privately. Your files are not shared — your privacy is our top priority.

q3.question: Is there a free trial available?
q3.answer: Sure, You can test Undressor with a free trial that lets you explore the main features before upgrading to a premium plan.

q4.question: Which image formats can I upload?
q4.answer: Undressor supports popular image formats including JPG, JPEG, PNG, AVIF, and WebP, as well as compressed images received via Telegram, ensuring compatibility with almost any image.

q5.question: What devices are supported?
q5.answer: Undressor AI works on all devices – desktop, tablet, and mobile. It supports iOS, Android, and PC. You can use it anytime for AI-powered photo transformations. Undressor is also available as apps on Telegram and WhatsApp for quick access.

q6.question: Where can I view Undressor AI examples?
q6.answer: You can view examples on our telegram blog, which provides visuals and demonstrations of how Undressor works with different types of photos.

q7.question: Can I Use Undressor for Videos?
q7.answer: Yes! Undressor now supports image-to-video generation, allowing you to upload short clips or images and transform them into smooth, realistic undressed content. Our AI adapts to movement, lighting, and facial expressions to deliver lifelike, seamless results.

secure.title: Secure
secure.subtitle: Your data is safe with us
